creator: chris.warry@chase.com
text:
I have had problems generating a font metric file from a type 1 font using 
PFMReader. I have not had any problems with TTFs.

System: Windows NT 4.0 (Service pack 5)

_a______.pfm (taken from Acrobat Reader 4.0) has been placed in a directory 
(called dev) together with charlist.xml. The CLASSPATH has been set to point to 
the neccessary jar files in the fop-0_17_0 directory. From the command prompt 
in dev,

c:\dev>java org.apache.fop.fonts.apps.PFMReader _a______.pfm Arial.xml

This starts the process of extracting the metrics information and then when it 
gets down to

"Postprocessing..."

it throws an exception

SystemId Unknown; Line 17; Column 34; javax.xml.transform.TransformerException: 
No scheme found in URI: charlist.xml at 
org.apache.xalan.transformer.TransformerImpl.transformNode
(TransformerImpl.java, Complied Code)
